function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neglect of informal settlements despite being characterized as degenerate and associated with social and contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and public health implications for the vulnerable population in the settlements.","Mitigation":"Regular health assessments, provision of healthcare services, and infrastructure improvement in informal settlements.","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, healthcare facilities, and infrastructure development.","People":"Residents of informal settlements, especially the vulnerable population.","Owner":"Local and national government, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Association of poverty, morality, and disease, leading to discriminatory urban planning and design decisions.","Impact":"Marginalization of the poor, increased health risks, and perpetuation of social stigma.","Mitigation":"Inclusive urban planning, public health education, and community engagement in decision-making processes.","Technologies":"Advanced healthcare technologies, urban planning software, and community engagement platforms.","People":"Low-income residents, marginalized communities, and public health advocates.","Owner":"Urban planners, public health agencies, and local authorities."},{"Description":"Use of 'surgical' and brutal slum clearance operations in response to contagious diseases outbreaks.","Impact":"Forced displacement, trauma, and social unrest within the affected communities.","Mitigation":"Humanitarian and ethical approaches to urban clearance, provision of alternative housing, and community empowerment programs.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, community mapping tools, and trauma-informed design principles.","People":"Displaced residents, vulnerable populations, and community activists.","Owner":"Local government, humanitarian organizations, and community-led initiatives."}]}
